ŋkāa Kovid-19

29.agq: Ǹ SÔ KƏ̀AA ÀGHƏA AN TUW WOAGHƏ̄A SƏ̀GHÀMBƏ̄GHĀ

30.agq: Ǹ SÔ KƏ̀AA ÀGHƏA AN TUW WOAGHƏ̄A SƏ̀GHÀMBƏ̄GHĀ

42.agq: Fə̀ŋgôʼ fə te fə n ndzā mbī edzə̀m. Fə mò kaʼ nughū tsughu an Chainà alo ntsuʼ ŋghəm n təgha à tsuʼ fo fə mɔ̀ʼ an ndzɔ̄ŋ è fwòo alo tənùu təkam təbə̀ghà à nùu tǒ tɛ̀ndzūghū (31 December 2019). Ghî à naam kəŋɔ kətuw kùu ndùw sa e fə̀ŋgôʼ fə̀ è fì; luʼū kəlā fə gbən sə kɔ̄ʼ ā tē.
42.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

43.agq: Fə̀ŋgôʼ fə te fə n ndzā mbī edzə̀m. Fə mò kaʼ nughū tsughu an Chainà alo ntsuʼ ŋghəm n təgha à tsuʼ fo fə mɔ̀ʼ an ndzɔ̄ŋ è fwòo alo tənùu təkam təbə̀ghà à nùu tǒ tɛ̀ndzūghū (31 December 2019). Ghî à naam kəŋɔ kətuw kùu ndùw sa e fə̀ŋgôʼ fə̀ è fì; luʼū kəlā fə gbən sə kɔ̄ʼ ā tē.
43.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

44.agq: Fə̀ŋgôʼ fə te fə n ndzā mbī edzə̀m. Fə mò kaʼ nughū tsughu an Chainà alo ntsuʼ ŋghəm n təgha à tsuʼ fo fə mɔ̀ʼ an ndzɔ̄ŋ è fwòo alo tənùu təkam təbə̀ghà à nùu tǒ tɛ̀ndzūghū (31 December 2019). Ghî à naam kəŋɔ kətuw kùu ndùw sa e fə̀ŋgôʼ fə̀ è fì; luʼū kəlā fə gbən sə kɔ̄ʼ ā tē.
44.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

53.agq: Ghî ghəla ghe ki tsû wò am fə̂ŋ
53.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

54.agq: Ghî ghəla ghe ki tsû wò am fə̂ŋ
54.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

55.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

56.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

57.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

68.agq: - ghî à li a buʼù dzàŋà tùghu mo ghe kâa nì sam e twii zo, mo ghe kâa ghe baŋlo.
68.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

69.agq: - ghî à li a buʼù dzàŋà tùghu mo ghe kâa nì sam e twii zo, mo ghe kâa ghe baŋlo.
69.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

70.agq: - ghî à li a buʼù dzàŋà tùghu mo ghe kâa nì sam e twii zo, mo ghe kâa ghe baŋlo.
70.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

73.agq: Dziī təlā ghùu lò alebòʼò kòlonà

74.agq: Dziī təlā ghùu lò alebòʼò kòlonà

75.agq: - Abugho ghùw mɔ̀m tsughu fəgha ko mò ghùw ù lì ŋ kūɛɛ naŋa zɔ̀ʼ kə̀ è chì ŋkāa mùghù mì è mi, vʉ̀ ù lɛnlō nì kɔ̀ʼ ghu ā wən gho kɔʼ foʼ kɔʼ esə, mɔ̀m ndùw èdzughu ŋkāa bɛ̀ʼɛ̀ nyə̄ ndùw mbuw tə ewī, ù m bòʼò kòlonà.
75.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

76.agq: - Abugho ghùw mɔ̀m tsughu fəgha ko mò ghùw ù lì ŋ kūɛɛ naŋa zɔ̀ʼ kə̀ è chì ŋkāa mùghù mì è mi, vʉ̀ ù lɛnlō nì kɔ̀ʼ ghu ā wən gho kɔʼ foʼ kɔʼ esə, mɔ̀m ndùw èdzughu ŋkāa bɛ̀ʼɛ̀ nyə̄ ndùw mbuw tə ewī, ù m bòʼò kòlonà.
76.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

77.agq: - Abugho ghùw mɔ̀m tsughu fəgha ko mò ghùw ù lì ŋ kūɛɛ naŋa zɔ̀ʼ kə̀ è chì ŋkāa mùghù mì è mi, vʉ̀ ù lɛnlō nì kɔ̀ʼ ghu ā wən gho kɔʼ foʼ kɔʼ esə, mɔ̀m ndùw èdzughu ŋkāa bɛ̀ʼɛ̀ nyə̄ ndùw mbuw tə ewī, ù m bòʼò kòlonà.
77.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

86.agq: Ghù lò alekə̀əŋ dzàŋ e tē zō an dzǐi tə ghɛ tō?

87.agq: Ghù lò alekə̀əŋ dzàŋ e tē zō an dzǐi tə ghɛ tō?

93.agq: 2. E tsoʼn̄ suūw zee ghu gho alo kəsùw à mùghù mò. Ghù n zè tsughu an bàtɛ̀lɛ (tawə̀n) è zɔ̀lɔ.
93.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

94.agq: 2. E tsoʼn̄ suūw zee ghu gho alo kəsùw à mùghù mò. Ghù n zè tsughu an bàtɛ̀lɛ (tawə̀n) è zɔ̀lɔ.
94.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

97.agq: 3. Abugho ghù so e kuɛɛ kə̀zɔ̀ʼ ŋkāa ghù so e tsom, ghù ŋ gwən koʼ tsə̂nèkəkwe tsom tsughu ŋkāa kuɛɛ tsughu a tē.

98.agq: 3. Abugho ghù so e kuɛɛ kə̀zɔ̀ʼ ŋkāa ghù so e tsom, ghù ŋ gwən koʼ tsə̂nèkəkwe tsom tsughu ŋkāa kuɛɛ tsughu a tē.

101.agq: 4. Kǎ nyòm è kwu pfʉ.Kà bûʼ mɔ̀m sùghò nyòm tə̀ tughu to.
101.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

102.agq: 4. Kǎ nyòm è kwu pfʉ.Kà bûʼ mɔ̀m sùghò nyòm tə̀ tughu to.
102.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

111.agq: 5. Kà kuʼso tee ghàa ghùw wəla ù kuɛɛ̄, tsoō zɔ̀ʼkò, e fughuu tsughu fòʼ e mɔ̀ʼ abugho ghù lǒ ghāa ghê ghì ghò.Kà kuʼn̄ tēe.

112.agq: 5. Kà kuʼso tee ghàa ghùw wəla ù kuɛɛ̄, tsoō zɔ̀ʼkò, e fughuu tsughu fòʼ e mɔ̀ʼ abugho ghù lǒ ghāa ghê ghì ghò.Kà kuʼn̄ tēe.

113.agq: 5. Kà kuʼso tee ghàa ghùw wəla ù kuɛɛ̄, tsoō zɔ̀ʼkò, e fughuu tsughu fòʼ e mɔ̀ʼ abugho ghù lǒ ghāa ghê ghì ghò.Kà kuʼn̄ tēe.

116.agq: 6. Kǎ ghùw aŋ ghū tɔɔŋ zūw, e noʼo kɔʼɔ ko tuw kō ŋkāa ghù n tɔɔŋ ndùw ko alo edzughu.
116.en: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.

117.agq: 6. Kǎ ghùw aŋ ghū tɔɔŋ zūw, e noʼo kɔʼɔ ko tuw kō ŋkāa ghù n tɔɔŋ ndùw ko alo edzughu.
117.en: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.

120.agq: 7. Kà è nyəa an sāʼ kə aghì, kà tee an lùʼu kəlā ndə̀m è àghì ŋge lo.

121.agq: 7. Kà è nyəa an sāʼ kə aghì, kà tee an lùʼu kəlā ndə̀m è àghì ŋge lo.

124.agq: 8. Kà è laŋā bwiī kaŋlo, e doʼn̄ tsughuu alo ghù an ndūghū.

125.agq: 8. Kà è laŋā bwiī kaŋlo, e doʼn̄ tsughuu alo ghù an ndūghū.

128.agq: 9. Tsʉ kɔ̄ʼ tuūŋ wo aletɔʼɔ̄ zəən tsughu ghəa zō, kà è maʼn kaaŋ fom tō, kà ghəa e kə̂a mò ghù kwò yo chi zō.
128.en: 9. Keep informed and verify the source of information.

130.agq: - Nǐi kɔʼ tee fəghà fò ghù tɔŋɔ tsughu taŋ zən: 1510, mbɔɔm bwǐi ko an shwāʼ u ghûwŋgàŋ wəla u so kweēn kɔʼɔ̄. Ghe gbôo yò kʉa wō. To ghù tɔŋɔ sugho :
130.en: - Call 1510 and follow the doctor's instructions. Other possible numbers:

143.agq: Kə̀chìa kì alebɔɔm diī tsughu ko tuw kə wə̄n ko, bwìi ko an lwàŋ e kwo ghùw è boʼo. Ū bəlā dzughù fughu â tom ghō.
143.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.

144.agq: Kə̀chìa kì alebɔɔm diī tsughu ko tuw kə wə̄n ko, bwìi ko an lwàŋ e kwo ghùw è boʼo. Ū bəlā dzughù fughu â tom ghō.
144.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.
